tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_copy_variations (
 ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_text TEXT,
 ad_variation TEXT,
 clicks INT,
 conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE test_results (
 test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_id INT,
 test_date DATE,
 test_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reference_data (
 reference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_id INT,
 reference_type TEXT,
 reference_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_copy_variations (
 ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_copy TEXT,
 ad_description TEXT,
 test_results JSON
)

CREATE TABLE test_results_data (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_id INT,
 test_date TIMESTAMP,
 test_result JSON
)

CREATE TABLE successful_tests (
 test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_id INT,
 test_result JSON
)

CREATE TABLE failed_tests (
 test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_id INT,
 failure_reason TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE ad_variants (ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ad_text TEXT, ad_status TEXT)
